name: 2023 4th International Conference on Machine Learning and Human-Computer Interaction
content: Paper Publication: Accepted papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). MLHMI 2020&2021 papers have been indexed by EI and Scopus, and MLHMI 2022 was successflly held on during March 18-20, 2022, all papers accepted will be indexed by EI and Scopus soon.
